item.title: NIF event: In conversation with Senator Penny Wong
item.description: For the event celebrating 10 years since the New Israel Fund’s establishment in Australia we hosted a number of speakers, including Senator the Hon.

item.title: Labor’s resolution ‘doesn’t undermine support for Israel’
item.description: The Australian Jewish News published my op-ed on resolutions about Israel-Palestine at Labor’s recent national conference.
